verses.name: Acts 4:17
verses.text: But that it spread no further among the people, let us straitly threaten them, that they speak henceforth to no man in this name.

verses.name: Acts 4:18
verses.text: And they called them, and commanded them not to speak at all nor teach in the name of Jesus.

verses.name: Acts 4:19
verses.text: But Peter and John answered and said unto them, Whether it be right in the sight of God to hearken unto you more than unto God, judge ye.

verses.name: Acts 4:20
verses.text: For we cannot but speak the things which we have seen and heard.
